column5: Might be heading to a cousin's cottage in Minden in the next couple of days, only problem is that I have to drive off road down a trail.  Anyone know how many inches of snow is on the ground as of today?    Thanks,    Entropy
About 10 cms. yesterday it was 1 cm of fresh stuff with slush/wet snow below. Today it is probably very hard pack underneath.
Drove back from Kennisis on Sunday...  Hope you got winter tires!!
It's never a good sign when someone wants a snow report and a dude comes on called Highdrifter.  Glad you made it home safely, Fidel.

Just got back from Carnarvon 5 minutes ago. Was able to drive in 9km unplowed road to my place with my Silverado 4x4, buy I see they will be getting some snow in the next couple days. 10-15 cm currently is about right.
